          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Metamorf kőzetek képződése</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Formation Of Metamorphic Rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anordnung Der Metamorphen Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Formation des Roches Métamorphiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Formação De Rochas Metamorphic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Formazione Delle Roccie Metamorfiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σχηματισμός των μεταμορφικών βράχων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Formación De Rocas Metamórficas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Kis és nagy területeket érintő metamorfózis, palás, nem palás szerkezetű metamorfitok.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Metamorphosis Concening Small and Large Ares, Metamorphites with Slate and Non-slate Structure.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">földrajz</string>
            <string language="en-US">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kőzettan</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en-US">litospheric plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metamorphose Concening kleines und großes Ares, 
Metamorphites mit Schiefer und Nicht-Schiefer Struktur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Métamorphose petit et grand Ares de Concening, 
Metamorphites avec l'ardoise et la structure de Non-ardoise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Metamorphosis Ares pequeno e grande de Concening,
Metamorphites com slate e estrutura do Non-non-slate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metamorfosi piccolo e grande Ares di Concening, 
Metamorphites con l'ardesia e la struttura dell'Non-ardesia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταμόρφωση Concening μικρό και μεγάλο Ares, 
Metamorphites με την πλάκα και τη δομή μη-πλακών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Metamorfosis Ares pequeño y grande de Concening,
Metamorphites con la pizarra y la estructura de la No-pizarra.</string>
          </description>
